news.message: The Winning Streak ability now works as intended! Instead of adding a small bonus to every candy, it now grants a substantial one-time bonus when you complete each level. The bonus scales with both your progress and the candy multiplier, making deep runs extremely rewarding. Try disabling level skip upgrades for maximum candy farming!
